database.name: oracle
database.recordCountQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordDeletionQuery: DELETE FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ?
database.recordMergeQuery: MERGE INTO {{TABLE_NAME}} dest USING( SELECT ? timestamp, ? data, ? record_id FROM dual) src ON(dest.record_id = src.record_id) WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(timestamp, data, record_id) VALUES(src.timestamp, src.data, src.record_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET dest.timestamp = src.timestamp, dest.data = src.data
database.recordRetrievalQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data from (SELECT rownum RNUM, record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE timestamp >= ? AND timestamp < ? and rownum <= ?) where RNUM > ?
database.recordRetrievalWithIdsQuery: SELECT record_id, timestamp, data FROM {{TABLE_NAME}} WHERE record_id IN ({{RECORD_IDS}})

recordTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE {{TABLE_NAME}} (record_id VARCHAR2(50), timestamp NUMBER(19), data BLOB, PRIMARY KEY(record_id))

database.fsUpdateDataPathQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_DATA SET path = ? WHERE path = ?
database.fsFileLengthRetrievalQuery: SELECT length FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = ?
database.fsListFilesQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE parent_path = ?
database.fsReadDataChunkQuery: SELECT data FROM AN_FS_DATA WHERE path = ? AND sequence = ?
database.fsSetFileLengthQuery: UPDATE AN_FS_PATH SET length = ? WHERE path = ?

fsTableInitQueries.query: CREATE TABLE AN_FS_PATH (path VARCHAR2(256), is_directory NUMBER(1), length NUMBER(19), parent_path VARCHAR2(256), PRIMARY KEY(path), FOREIGN KEY (parent_path) REFERENCES AN_FS_PATH(path) ON DELETE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE AN_FS_DATA (path VARCHAR2(256), sequence NUMBER(19), data BLOB, PRIMARY KEY (path,sequence), FOREIGN KEY (path) REFERENCES AN_FS_PATH(path) ON DELETE CASCADE)

database.fsTablesCheckQuery: SELECT path FROM AN_FS_PATH WHERE path = '/'
database.fsMergeDataChunkQuery: INSERT INTO AN_FS_DATA (path,sequence,data) VALUES (?, ?, ?) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE data=VALUES(data)
